descriptionHtml:
[center] [b][font=Times New Roman][color=#a61c00][size=6]MJOLL[/size][/color][/font]
[/b][img]http://s32.postimg.org/c8gxl6blh/20160507172324_1.jpg[/img][size=3]
A standalone Mjoll replacer.
[i]She's a work in progress, apologies for any mistakes!
UnfortunatelyÂ she's NOT compatible with Wet and Cold. I'll work on it.[/i]
Requires:
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE (most mods do, it's a basic need :p)[/url]
[/size]
Installation:
Extract the files into your Skyrim data folder, which is usually located in; Steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim/Data.

Mods used to create her:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]UNP Body (NSFW)[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Brows[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdo's[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]Eyes of Beauty
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url] (to create her face.)

Mods used in screenshots:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61471/?]Dragon Tree Temple[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?]RealVision ENB[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures[/url]

Recommended:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19340/?]aMidianBorn Iron Armor Retexture[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]FaceLight[/url]


[size=3][i]Have fun, and don't forget to post your images and give feedback![/i][/size]

[size=2]{I am new to modding, if you have any issues feel free to message me and I'll do what I can.}[/size]

Credits (and a huge thank you) to:
HelloSanta for SG Brows and SG Female Textures.
CaBal for aMidianBorn Iron Armor Retexture.
SkyrimTuner for the RealVision ENB.
LogRaam for the Eyes of Beauty.
Kalilies, Stealthic Khaos and Shocky for KS Hairdo's Renewal.
ECE Team for Enhanced Character Edit.
tktk1 for FaceLight.
bhaktisean for Dragon Tree Temple.[/center]
author: brella2002
